header.title: List of Statutory Rules of Northern Ireland, 2001

categories.category: Lists of Statutory Rules of Northern Ireland

table.style: width:21em; border:2px solid navy; text-align:center; font-size:90%;

of the

bdy.p:
This is an incomplete list of
Statutory Rules of Northern Ireland
in 2001.
